author: Special Correspondent
text:
The city police on Thursday rounded up 35 cadre of the Samathuva Makkal Katchi when they attempted to picket the trains to protest against the ban on holding jallikattu in the State.

Led by the district secretaries Michael (Salem west) and Jawahar (Salem East), the party volunteers staged a demonstration in front of the Railway Junction.

Later they attempted to enter the junction to block the trains, when the police prevented them and took them into custody.
title: Protest against ban on jallikattu
